page.title: 05FURNITURE RESTORERS
page.content: The antique restorers is not in the very centre of Horseheath it is on the edge of Horseheath.The furniture restorers is quite old and first of all was horse stables(built of clunch.)The owners of the antique restorers are Mr. Short and Mr. Polley they are the only people who work on the skilful restoration. Mr. Polley runs the upholstery part and Mr. Short runs the cabinet making.We did a survey on how many customers came in every day for a week,we found out that on week days Mr. Short and Mr.Polley normally have 1 customer every day but not on Saturdays when they can expect 2to3 customers.The oldest antique they have ever sold was a chest of drawers.They do not only restore antiques they copy old and valuable items like chairs,cabinets,tables,and clocks.
